concept.title: What is Prose.io
concept.shortdesc: This document will explain what prose.io is

conbody.p: Prose.io is a content editor for Github.
You are able to select what repository to push to to create a new piece of content in a markdown language.
Once within the repository, you can select a folder and subfolder to push your materials to.
The site also includes a tool bar with stylistic tools.
